title: Studio in Evanston Steps to Northwestern - Starting 9/1/2022
neighborhood: Evanston - Northwestern University, Rogers Park, Edgewater
posting_body: ['Lease starts 9/1/2022!!', 'Call or text Rizo at (847) 373-6168', 'Apartment Features:', '-Stainless Steel Appliances', '-Oak Cabinets', '-Quartz Countertops', '-Hardwood Floors throughout', '-Ceramic Bathroom', '-Eat-In Kitchen', 'Building Features:', '-Indoor Bike Storage', '-Intercom Secured Entry', '-On-Site Laundry', '-On-Site Management and Maintenance', 'Parking Available!', 'Located in Downtown Evanston and steps to Northwestern University, this Evanston apartment is close to the Metra Train, Post office, bakery, restaurants, and banks!', 'You can not be more centrally located in Evanston than this!', 'Easy commute to Rogers Park, Edgewater, West Ridge, Lincoln Square and Downtown Chicago.', '2nd month rent free for qualified applicants signing a 2 year lease!', 'Utility package additional $80 covers heat, water, and trash.', 'Tenants pays electricity and cooking gas separately.', 'Visit our website at <URL> for more information and similar apartments.']
